nodes.text: Romorron, known as Romorron the Slayer, was a male bounty hunter during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, where he could be found selling armor to other hunters on Vaiken Spacedock.

Romorron the Slayer appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the PvP Ranked Gear Vendor for the Bounty Hunter class on Vaiken Spacedock. He was later removed as a vendor and NPC in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system. Nonetheless, he remains in the game, as his character model is used as part of the background environment in the redesigned fleet areas.
